title: Chapter 11 A Description of Earthsea
content: PEOPLES AND LANGUAGES PEOPLE THE HARDIC LANDS THE KARGAD LANDS DRAGONS LANGUAGES WRITING History Note on dates: Many islands have their own local count of years. The most widely used dating system in the Archipelago, which stems from the Havnorian Tale, makes the year Morred took the throne the first year of history. By this system, "present time" in the account you are reading is the Archipelagan year 1058. THE BEGINNINGS The beginning of the first stanza is quoted in Tehanu: and the last line of the first stanza: Then from the foam bright Ea broke.
